name: Space Junk Miner
description:
Winner of Jamingtons 2017!

Grow your ship by colliding with parts to "glue" them to your ship. Blow up asteroids to collect minerals. How many minerals can you collect before the enemies destroy your ship? How big can you grow your ship? How many kills can you get? WHO KNOWS. I DON'T. DO YOU?

TIP: If you're moving slow, your ship's weight is too high. Make sure you pick up enough boosters (orange circles) to offset the weight!

CONTROLS:

WASD - move/rotate

J/L or Left/Right Arrow Keys - strafe

Space Bar - shoot

Q - detach last ship part

GAME PLAY:

Blue Boxes - lasers (space bar to fire)

Orange Circles - boosters (higher velocity when ship mass increases)

Red Circles - Max HP + 2

NOTE: If you fly for a while and don't find parts, just keep going... They're there. I swear.

NOTE 2: Your speakers aren't broken, there is no sound in space. (really I only heard about this jam 6 hours ago so I didn't have time...)
